{{also|報・連・相}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ほう|れん|そう}}

===Etymology===
An [[initialism]] using the first characters from the words {{m|ja|報告|'''報'''告|tr='''hō'''koku|report, reporting}} + {{m|ja|連絡|'''連'''絡|tr='''ren'''raku|contacting, communicating}} + {{m|ja|相談|'''相'''談|tr='''sō'''dan|consulting, discussing}}.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

Intentionally coined as a [[homophone]] with {{m|ja|菠薐草|tr=hōrensō||spinach}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ほうれんそう|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|報・連・相}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ほうれんそう}}

# [[reporting]], [[communicating]], and [[consulting]]: an [[approach]] to [[decision-making]] and the sharing of [[information]] in an [[organization]]
#: Compare the “[[w:Responsibility assignment matrix|RACI]]” initialism used in some project management approaches.
